reinject.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 
00003 !  ========================================
00004 !
00005 !     Thermal particle reinjection
00006 !    - conserves  background temp. 
00007 !    - pairwise injection for uy,uz to give zero transverse current
00008 !
00009 !  ========================================
00010 
00011  subroutine reinject(vt,idir,uxi,uyi,uzi)
00012 
00013  use utils
00014 
00015  implicit none
00016  real, parameter :: pi=3.14159265
00017  integer, parameter :: nsamp=300000
00018  integer :: idir, ntrial
00019  real*8, save :: usamp(nsamp+1)
00020  real*8  :: uxi, uyi
00021  real*8, save :: theta
00022  real*8 :: df,f0,A,u,du,g,uzi,g0
00023  real :: rs
00024  real :: ute,  pio2, umax
00025  real, intent(in) :: vt
00026  integer, save :: idum=-13
00027  integer, save :: isamp=1
00028  integer, save :: i2
00029  integer :: i,k, nsteps
00030 
00031 !  conserve flux in x dirn: maintain const. Te
00032 
00033 !  Tabulate momenta on first call
00034     ute = vt**2  ! Temperature normalised to mc^2
00035     pio2 = pi/2
00036    if (isamp.eq.1) then
00037 
00038         nsteps=100000
00039 !  dimensionless electron/ion temp
00040         umax=6.*sqrt(ute + 4*ute**2)
00041         du=umax/nsteps
00042 !  distn norm factor
00043         A = 1.0001*nsamp/2./pi/ute/(1+ute)
00044         f0=0.
00045         k=1
00046 
00047 !  load loop
00048         do i=1,nsteps
00049 
00050 !  cumulative integral of rel. distn function f(u)
00051           u = i*du
00052           g = sqrt(u**2 + 1.0)
00053           df = 2*pi*A*du*u*exp((1.-g)/ute)
00054 
00055           f0 = f0+df
00056 
00057           if(f0.ge.k) then
00058 !  store u corresponding to integer values of f0
00059             usamp(k) = u
00060             k=k+1
00061           endif
00062         end do
00063 !        write(40,*) (usamp(k),k=1,nsamp)
00064       endif
00065 
00066 !  Flux in x-dirn: invert Int (vx f(ux) dux) directly
00067      
00068       rs=rano(idum)
00069       g0 = max(1.0,1.0-ute*alog(rs))
00070       uzi = idir*sqrt(g0**2-1.d0)
00071 
00072 !  pick random  u from sample:  
00073 !  usamp contains integrated momentum flux Int(u f(u) du)
00074       if (mod(isamp,2).eq.1) then
00075         ntrial = nsamp*rano(idum)+1
00076        i2=min(nsamp,ntrial)
00077 !  components for uy,uz
00078        theta=2*pi*rano(idum)
00079        uxi = usamp(i2)*cos(theta)
00080        uyi = usamp(i2)*sin(theta)
00081 !  write(40,*) 'isamp=',isamp,' i2=',i2,' idum=',idum,'ux,uy=',uxi, uyi
00082       else
00083 !  use -ve of previous sample
00084        uxi = -usamp(i2)*cos(theta)
00085        uyi = -usamp(i2)*sin(theta)
00086 !  write(40,*) 'isamp=',isamp,' i2=',i2,' idum=',idum, 'ux,uy=',uxi, uyi
00087       endif
00088   
00089 !  increment sample index
00090       isamp = isamp + 1
00091       if (isamp.gt.nsamp) isamp = 1
00092 
00093   end subroutine reinject
